brainly_data.question: The essential message of the final stanza is that the ______________. a. poet hopes the reader has found something memorable in the poem b. speaker wishes Childe Harold glory in his future life as a knight c. poet dwells obsessively on how his poem could have been improved d. speaker announces his intention to give up poetry
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: The essential message of the final stanza is that the ______________. a. poet hopes the reader has found something memorable in the poem b. speaker wishes Childe Harold glory in his future life as a knight c. poet dwells obsessively on how his poem could have been improved d. speaker announces his intention to give up poetry
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text:
- -a. poet hopes the reader has found something memorable in the poem

The essential message of the final stanza is that the poet hopes the reader has found something memorable in the poem.

Final answer: A
